item.title: DOJ seizes $15 billion in bitcoin from massive 'pig butchering' scam based in Cambodia
item.description: An indictment says forced-labor compounds ran cryptocurrency investment fraud schemes that stole billions of dollars from victims in the U.S. and else...

item.title: Airports refuse to show DHS Sec. Kristi Noem video blaming Democrats for government shutdown
item.description: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, which operates three major airports, said, its "policies prevent airing of politically partisan message...

item.title: Trump threatens China with cooking oil embargo over soybean snub
item.description: President Donald Trump said the U.S. is considering ending its cooking oil trade with China in retaliation for Beijing refusing to buy U.S. soybeans.

item.title: Trump trade rep says new 100% tariff on China depends on Beijing's next move
item.description: The U.S. and China are working to find a solution to a dispute over Beijing's rare earth controls, U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer told CNBC.

item.title: Trump shutdown firings touch bipartisan priorities: Not just 'Democrat Agencies'
item.description: Republican Sens. Susan Collins and Lisa Murkowski have spoken out against the firings by the Trump administration.
